Scientific name: Lasioglossum (Ctenonomia) sp. 1 [nr. vagans, larger, orange not white hair, denser T2 punctures]
Hylaeus (Nesoprosopis) sp. 2 [aff. transversalis][pronotal marks smaller; tegulae black with small yellow spot; propodeum reticulate; mangrove associated]
Hylaeus (Indialaeus) sp. [large, pronotum with unbroken yellow]
Nomia (Maculonomia) sp. 1 aff. apicalis [finer punctures; male with spine; smaller]
Hylaeus (new subgenus nr. Prosopisteron) sp. 1 aff. jacobsoni
Lasioglossum (Ctenonomia) sp. 3 [nr. vagans, larger, propodeal triangle more reticulate]
Hylaeus (Nesoprosopis) sp. 1 [nr. borneensis; T2 more densely punctate/hirsute; propodeum more reticulate less striate]
Megachile (Aethomegachile) sp. 3 [nr borneana with dark hairs]
